snippet.title: Era of Samurai: Code of Love - Opening Movie
snippet.description:
Join the ranks of the Shinsengumi warriors and experience a love so passionate, it will alter an era... 
◆Story◆
You’ve found yourself living under the same roof as the Shinsengumi warriors.
There, in their headquarters filled with samurai...
You’ll find out what lies hidden in the “Demon Deputy’s” heart,
Or discover the loneliness of a murderous master swordsman... 
 
They’re always just out of reach, but before long,
you find that one of these swordsmen have stolen your heart... 
However, your warrior is part of the Shinsengumi, a group of samurai hated and feared by the populace of the Capital.
The last thing he wants is to see you hurt, so he tries to drive you away from him. But you stand firm and take his hand...
And thus blooms a love so bright, it will shape an era…

★Love 365 at the App Store★
https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/love-365-find-your-story/id1266172764?mt=8

★Love 365 at Google Play★
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.voltage.g.hykoi.en&hl=ja
